text: @TeamPelosi I'm reading through this "coronavirus bill" and only 30 pages in. Who is "Legal Services Corp"(50 mil), why is there 410 mil for the Census, 250 mil for "offender reentry programs," and for fun, 1 mil specifically for a study of the "spread of Covid related disinformation?"
